thread.section_title: BoxyMo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BoxyMo | www.boxymo.ie
thread.title: Patrick Byrne

author: Patrick Byrne
title: Patrick Byrne
text:
This is my 3rd year with BoxyMo and I have to say I would totally recommend them. The telematics device they install in your car has made me a safer driver by making me more aware of how I was driving and of the speeds I was doing.
It also allowed me to get my daughter driving as their prices are very affordable.
I think it's a must for any parent who has a son or daughter driving, as they can monitor their driving, as you receive a weekly text showing you your driving scores and show's if you were speeding. That way you can stop their speeding habit before anything bad happens.
